Blackmailing start, they asked me for $500 else they will upload my video on youtube and send them to all my family members. Initially, I was like whatever man, fuck off. I uninstalled IMO, made my facebook account private and promised myself not to ever to something like this ever again.

I've been emotionally blackmailed. I was in elementary school (I can't remember if it started in 4th grade or if it was the summer following). She was my best friend, troubled childhood, but I loved her like a sister. She was mean, manipulative, and mischievous. I was invited over to her house for a play date. She'd been talking about playing house and “being more realistic”. She coerced me into playing “mommy and daddy” with her, naked, hiding in her closet. I didn't understand what I was doing, but every time I asked if we could stop, this is gross, I don't feel comfortable with doing this, I don't like this… she kept pushing and said she'd tell on me, saying it was my idea. Eventually it ended, I felt so disgusting and exposed, and after dinner my mom came to pick me up. Before she got there, I was pulled aside. “Remember. Don't tell anyone. This is our secret. I won't tell anyone either.” Fast forward to the beginning of fifth grade. We'd seen each other a few times at daycare, where she'd tried to get me to “play house” with her again and I was only saved from it by kids coming up to us wanting to play with the older girls. I remember one phrase that was on repeat for the next almost year of my life: “Do it, or else I'll tell.” This phrase was used when she threw a pencil on the floor during class and told me to pick it up. When she told me to sit on the floor like a dog and bark when the teacher asked me a question. When she told me to climb to the top of the jungle gym and jump down. When she wanted to be carried like a princess by me and our friends (and I'd have to convince our friends to just listen, because we need to). When a construction worker walked into the port-a-potty out behind the school and she wanted me to walk in on him. There were a myriad other situations where she blackmailed me into doing things I wasn't willing to do. This went on for nearly a year with no one noticing what was really going on. The few times I said no, she'd ask me if I was sure. Thinking she was being merciful, I'd say yes, I don't want to. “Okay,” she’d say, leaning over to someone or running up to another person and making an exaggerated effort to look like she's whispering about me to them. I'd run after her and tell her to stop, I'll do it, I'll do anything. And then, of course, I did. I'd pretend to be sick weekly. I'd take numerous “bathroom breaks” just to get out of classes I shared with her. I'd complain of nausea so I could be excused to sit with the nurse for a while. I'd try to heat up the thermometer my mother would use to take my temperature in an effort to appear feverish (the only symptom she'd allow me to stay home for, saying it meant I was actually sick). Eventually, my 5th grade teacher asked me to stay after class. She asked me what was going on, I could talk to her, she can keep secrets. I didn't tell her. I said I was fine. I think I cried. I don't know who told the guidance counselor that I needed to be seen, I think it may have been my teacher, or maybe she'd called my mom and my mom had asked me to be seen. I don't know. But I was called to her office, amid the chorus of “ooooh”s from my classmates. I thought I was in trouble. I decided I didn't care. She asked me what was going on, how I was feeling. Nothing. I'm fine. This went on for several sessions before I broke down and told her everything, feeling so ashamed and so worthless. I just wanted it to stop. I begged her not to tell my mom. She told me she had to, this was a matter of my safety and my mother had a right to know what was happening to me. I dreaded going home. We talked and cried and I cannot imagine how horrified and helpless my mother felt, knowing I'd been dealing with all of this for the better part of a year without her knowing. Everything was resolved shortly thereafter. We had a conference, and the girl was given an ultimatum: either she stopped this, or there would be severe consequences. Her mother would be told, I don't remember what else she may have been told. She stopped. I still suffer the consequences of that year. It took me months to be able to undress in front of my husband. I still have a very hard time with certain types of intimacy. I couldn't have an internal exam done until after I'd turned 23, as I couldn't think of having someone looking at me down there without having a full blown panic attack. I have a hard time trusting people, receiving hugs from anyone who isn't close to me, and especially being told what to do. But if she ever reads this, I want her to know that I forgive her. I know life wasn't easy for her growing up. I know she had a lot of anger as a kid. I also know that she's grown so much and I'm proud of her for the good things she's accomplished. I don't blame her at all, and I know she didn't fully understand the effects of her actions.

Indeed. I have been blackmailed years ago AND… I'm currently being blackmailed again! I have (thus far) refused to give in to the demands of the ringleader of the ongoing blackmail attempts. If you don't want to read my summary, just take note of this advice: TAKE PROACTIVE MEASURES Short story version: My Mother (age 68) is grieving the loss of her husband (he died last Nov). An *older (age 92) acquaintance of my (late) great grandmother invited my Mother to attend her small town church under the guise of alleviating her sadness. I was also encouraged to accompany my Mom, even though I'm Jewish. We went to six Sunday morning services, consecutively. On the morning of May 14th, 2017, Mother's Day, we were assaulted by *her daughter (age 67) in the church parking lot by this woman of formidable size and temper. She (Hope Lindau) was laying in wait for us and jumped out from behind a car and started waving a thick stack of flyers that she had made. The flyer had a mugshot of me from my only arrest which was in 2008, (I was charged with a non-violent misdemeanor that violated the B&P code). The BOLD PHONY HEADLINE printed on the flyer read, “WANTED IN THE USA! FACING IMMIGRATION CHARGES!!! CASH REWARD!!!” (For clarification: I was born in California. ICE will not be impressed). She demanded that we sign over the deeds to several of our real estate holdings to her, pay her $330,000.00 USD-in cash, and she even demanded the (rather modest) jewelry that I was wearing. The threatening consequences that she proposed included: “I’m gonna post these flyers on the church bulletin board! Whaddya think about THAT!” I couldn't stop myself from laughing uncontrollably. Then, she said that she had already alerted the police from the city where my misdemeanor charge was from to alert them to my whereabouts. I told her, “They already know exactly where I am and they aren't going to care about a misdemeanor conviction from 2008. You are just wasting everyone's time.” Then she went on a long whined tirade claiming that I didn't pay restitution fees on that case and trying to chastise me with free styling some conflated bible verses. I said, “Haven't you ever heard of “paid in full” you idiot?” She demanded PROOF that the restitution was paid. I told her she can contact the Attorney that I had work that case for me, but I forewarned her that he will likely agree with my POV which is that it's NOT HER CONCERN. Just because she's nosy and digging for dirt doesn't mean she's entitled to receive that information. She's a mediocre real estate agent with financial difficulties that she had previously made known to my Mother and I directly. Kind of strange since we have only met her 3 times. Anyhow, her motivation is clear. After it finally clicked in her mind that putting me on the spot wasn't going to be as effective as she had dreamed, she yelled, “You’re really starting to piss me off! I'm going to the bulletin board right now!!!”. Then she swiftly went inside of the church and my Mom and I left the parking lot. Because I have been blackmailed before, I now know of better ways to handle blackmail. In an effort to ward off any additional actions/confrontations by the blackmailer and her minions, I have thus far completed these proactive tasks: I filed a police report about the incident on 05/14/2017.I reported the incident to the ELCA in Chicago because this occurred at one of their churches.I had a meeting with a local Criminal Defense Attorney because I have to cover all bases on this because there is always a chance that the blackmailer will escalate this and/or get her minions to assist with framing me to add pressure to try and force money from me.This Attorney is able to see both sides of my scenario and he understands that I might want to preempt added conflict by having him file a restraining order against the blackmailer on my behalf.Also, if this blackmailer is allocating a great deal of time and energy towards trying to disrupt my life because I told her “NO”, I will already have a Criminal Defense Attorney on deck to defend me.Lastly, because she is a real estate salesperson, I reported her actions to the California Bureau of Real Estate, (since she's violating numerous laws of conduct and ethics that licensees are sworn to adhere to). Within two days of receiving my complaint, the Cal BRE opened an investigation.*She is from Sanger, CA- a very small town. Probably she has seen too many Lifetime movies and she has convinced herself that she is intimidating and above reproach. Not true.

‘Send me $4000 or I will publish this sex tape of you’. In the journey that is my life, this was a low point. Not for the fact I was being blackmailed. But because the sex tape was solo masturbation. I sat and stared at the screen, not knowing what to do. And then it hit me…   I’d been out of hospital for 5 months, maybe a little more. For anyone not caught up, I’d spent 244 days in hospital battling Leukemia. He was a tough opponent. Maybe my toughest ever. But after those 244 days we decided to call it a draw and call off the fight. I think I probably won on points, but I’m happy to agree to disagree. In any case, I was back at home and trying to figure out the best way forward. Keep in mind, this was only a few months after I was catfished by someone claiming to be a multi-millionaire from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. So you would think I would have learned to avoid trusting people online. But not me. I was hungry for more self-inflicted punishment like a bloke dressed as a dog in a sex dungeon. And that’s where I was, some night in some month, as the hands on the clock ticked past midnight. See, my house had an upstairs and a separate flat downstairs. This flat was self-contained and had been designed for my Grandfather. But he spoiled the plan by moving to Queensland and subsequently dying. Both of which made it hard for him to move back home. So it was just me, the creeping shadows, and the soft, blue light of my laptop which whirred gently in the night…  I was on some message board or chat room. Some dark corner of the internet where lost souls were drawn together to escape the harshness of their reality. For me that was the emotional pain and the ongoing confusion of being alive. Truthfully I had moments, that came cutting through my thoughts like a searing knife, where I felt a mistake had been made. That I should have been destined for passage beyond this world. But my papers were accidentally marked ‘stay’ instead of ‘leave’. Like maybe I’d cheated death and as a result he might come calling for me any moment. That type of guilt and fear that follows trauma can destroy you. Eat you alive from the inside out and leave you a still, soulless shell. In a way that’s why I was drawn to these rooms and message boards. Because no one knew the real me. The damaged me. The destroyed me. … And also because I was horny.  I can’t remember her screen name. But it wasn’t something outrageous like: Kittycat69xXgirlfreak18XxSexSlut9000Overall, she seemed normal. She seemed nice. And she just wanted to chat. There wasn’t a single ulterior motive to be found. Until there was… She must have invested a solid hour into our chat. Maybe more. And not once had we talked about sex. So when she said she wanted to jump on cam with me, it was a fluid progression. Her screen shot was cute as all hell. And I’d recently got a $15 haircut from the local barber who could literally only do a ‘short back and sides’. So I was looking sharp too. And just like that, we were having cam sex…  That’s a horrible term. ‘Cam sex’. You’re not having sex on camera. You’re masturbating in front of a camera. By that logic I’ve had ‘Hand Sex’ thousands of times in my life. Every time my Mum would duck to the shops I’d seduce myself with some Hand Sex. In any case, she was naked and I was naked and we were watching each other be naked. And while strange sex acts on the fringes of society like this get a bad rap, this girl was smoking hot! Like, couldn’t believe my luck hot. Which would all make sense shortly… She was tanned and toned, with lengthy brown hair that fell long over her shoulders, and a body that would make a priest cry. And as I sat there and watched herself make two fingers disappear like the world’s most X-rated magic trick, I felt pretty bloody good about myself. She must have been into me too. Because she asked me to be louder. To lean in to the camera. To show her just how fucking into her I was. So I obliged. I was noisy and raucous and all the things she asked of me. Let me tell you now, I put on a damn fine show. And as I finished my part of this dirty duo it felt just as good as it ever had. Until her video feed snapped off and the screen was instantly returned to black.  I thought it was a technical error for a moment. Until words began to appear on screen. ‘You have been recorded’ this anonymous text said. I was beyond confused. But moments later her screen flashed back to life. Only she wasn’t on the other end. I was. Footage of me, filmed just seconds ago, was beamed back to me as the blood drained from my face. She’d been recording me the whole time. The noises she asked me to make, the desire to see my face close to the camera, it was all part of her plan to create a video so embarrassing and mortifying that it could be used. Used to blackmail me. The anonymous words returned. ‘This recording belongs to me now. Deposit $4000 in this account within the next 60 minutes’. A selection of digits flashed onto the screen. But I couldn’t see them clearly. My head was spinning. I didn’t have $4000. I didn’t have $400. Hell, I barely had $40 to scrape together. The words continued. ‘If you do not pay me $4000 within 60 minutes I will upload this video to every Porn site available and direct message it to everyone in your Facebook contact list’. I’m man enough to open my heart. My long list of dirty stories on here are proof of that. And I will happily admit I cried. Tears rolled down my face as this blackmailer sat, whoever it was, and waited for a 21 year old kid, just out of hospital for Leukemia, to decide what to do. I couldn’t let that video get out. My life would be over. I would never live down the shame of everyone I know seeing the video. I thought about it. I could explain it to my parents and they’d always love me. The same with my best mates. But my brothers would never forget it. My acquaintances at school would never forget it. Those people you connect with on Facebook that you never talk to, they’d all see it and spread the word like wildfire. I’d have to move states. Even countries. And what if I could never run away from the shame? What were my options then? I sat. In the dark. And cried. ’60 minutes or less. If you sign out of this conversation, I will send the video’. I was stuck, unable to run, and desperate to go. And so we waited. My blackmailer and I. In the dark. With the clock ticking.   You’re probably wondering what happened after that. What I did and what choices I made? What twists and turns my life took? Did I stay? Did I pay? Did I run? Or did I fight? I’m tempted to end the story here. After all, the endings you would all conjure up would be more interesting and inspiring than the truth. And is a memorable story about what actually happened, or what should have happened? But to leave the ending up in the air would only empower this blackmailer. And if you take anything away from this story, I hope it’s a sense of confidence. That you’re never at the mercy of others. Instead, you’re always in charge. There’s an old proverb that I love. In fact, I live my life by it. I have ever since that night. It’s the reason I write on here with such honesty and openness without fear of embarrassment or shame. ‘If there is no enemy within, the enemy outside can do us no harm’. That phrase fuels my life. If I willingly give you my deepest, darkest secrets, you can never use them against me. Your words have no power to be used against me, not if I placed them in your hands first. That night, in the dark, with this blackmailer threatening to rip my dignity from me forever, was the first time I ever put that phrase into practice. I realised, after 10 minutes or so of pure terror, that my Skype email address was not connected to my Facebook. If this blackmailer searched Facebook using the one email address they knew, they would find nothing. So there was a 0% chance they could find my Facebook contact list. I told them just that. ‘Then I will post this video on every Porn site available. Everyone will see what you have done’. The threat was still very real and very raw. ‘If there is no enemy within’. I took a deep breath. ‘Then the enemy outside can do us no harm’. I reached forward and started typing. Because you can’t expose my secrets. If I have none. I replied with… ‘Post it. And make sure you tag me in each and every one’  I have no idea if that video went online. I know for a fact that the blackmailing piece of shit never got a single cent from me. And in the years since I’ve told this story many times. Which might seem crazy to share such an embarrassing tale. But in the last few years there have been a number of high-profile suicides from teenagers and men who feel no other way out of the exact same situation than to end their lives. That’s a burden I won’t bear. I would rather carry the responsibility of being a storyteller, even if the story doesn’t paint me in the prettiest light, and show that being blackmailed for getting your ding-dong out and wailing like a banshee is not the end of the world. If anyone out there has experienced this same thing, or knows anyone who has, show ’em this story. Remind them that a fleeting moment of shame will pass. But blackmailers will remain a collection of spineless, faceless losers around the world when it does. So I’ll admit that I was blackmailed. And just as quickly I was born again. A storyteller with no shame. An exceptional masturbation performer who puts on one hell of a show. And if that blackmailer was telling the truth, a published porn star in my own right. So if anyone comes across that video online, be sure to give it a like and a comment, and before you close that window, make sure you tag me in the video, so I can tell everyone about it too. Yeah, as a teenager. By my little sister. Over my stash of porn mags. We’d just moved over into our new home when I was sixteen (she was thirteen) and we both had our own rooms. This was a big deal since that was a huge 4X up-sizing going from the tiny one-room tenement of my childhood to this three bedroom apartment. She got a brand new bed, study table and all of that in her room while I inherited all of the old furniture. It made sense since I would be going away in a few months to med school in a city six hundred miles away from home, so it made no sense to furnish my room. And I then stashed away all of the lad mags which I had in the storage under my bed. She discovered it one of the afternoons that summer while she was searching for some old bed spread (from our previous home) which was still stored under my bed. And then she threatened to tell Mom. I pleaded of her not to do it, so she said “Fine, I won’t.” Ah, but that wasn’t the end of it. See, I was in charge of tutoring her. And I was a harsh disciplinarian with anyone I taught. So then a couple of times when I was angrily berating her for not doing her studies properly, her patience was at an end and she says defiantly “Stop yelling at me Allen, or I’ll tell Mom about your stash!” What a little rogue! Well the first time she did it, it gave me pause “Wow! This one might actually be serious about her threat.” That took me aback at first but then it got me pretty angry. So then when she tried playing that card again a couple of days later, I called out her bluff and said “Okay, you know what? I don’t need to tutor you anyway. It’s not like I’m getting paid for this or something! Just means I have more time now to sleep or play football.” That surprisingly worked. Actually thinking in retrospect, it shouldn’t have been one bit surprising. For one thing, my little sister and I shared a very deep bond right since our youngest years and were thick as thieves, how we NEVER EVER ratted out on the other. That continues right to this day. Oh we had more fights than we could keep count of but as I used to tease her “Mom has eight siblings, Dad has five. But you and I? We have only each other as brother and sister, so get used to it!” Secondly and rather ironically, it was she who had initially demanded that I tutor her instead of Mom! Because while I was unarguably more stern and even severe as a teacher, I was also very consistent and fair. I didn’t send mixed signals, didn’t get suddenly unpredictable, the rules got laid down clearly right upfront. And as an added bonus, I got results and everyone loves winning or ranking at the top. The funny thing is that once I left home to start med school that year, Mom started to check on her again and she complained while crying about how “Allen was much more fairer than you! He understood me much better but now he is gone!” Later that year she told me how Mom would then discover my stash of lad mags and the sweet devout woman described them as the seed of evil! Hahaha! She was in a dilemma how to dispose them off and eventually decided they needed to be burned. I told my little sis “Tell Mom to give them to the garbage collector, he’ll be delighted!” Didn’t happen, Mom burned them. I swear to god man, my mother has always been very devout but this was straight-up “16th century Puritan mode.” Of course it didn’t help one bit that my bed (and the stash) was right below the prayer altar in my bedroom with those two large portraits of the Sacred Heart of Jesus and the Holy Mother Mary looking down on it. Some of my ex-wife’s friends called it “blackmail”, but I think it was technically extortion. My apologies if you read this elsewhere on Quora. **Background:** Years ago, my ex’s son from a prior common-law relationship, J, lived with us. When he was 16, he decided that a good way to be happy, was to start a family of his own. That’s when he met a 13-year-old girl, C, who also wanted to start a family. Right away, if possible. So, they had a little baby girl together, who I’ll call D. The new daddy was 17 or so. Mommy C was just 14. **Me and Little D.:** At that time in my life, I had not yet been around babies before, and when I first held her in the hospital, I was transfixed. Something changed inside me, and I knew that she was the most amazing and important thing in the world. But the young parents had planned poorly. In fact, they had no place to live, having left or been kicked out of several places during the pregnancy. So, after being discharged from maternity, they all came to our house. From there, they both took turns fighting, moving out, getting back together, then moving back out, etc. So, my ex and I did a lot of the child-care over the first few years. We had D full time for a few months, and then on most weekends, for a couple of years. During that time my ex was around less and less (long story), so more & more of the child care fell to me. Little D opened up a whole new part of me, of nurturing and self-sacrifice that I never imagined could be rewarding in itself. I changed her diapers. I made her bottles, then later made her meals. I put her to bed at night, and got up with her in the morning. I played with her, and took her shopping with me. None of this felt like a burden to me - I loved her to bits. If she got a bump or cut, she ran past others to get comfort from me. If she got hurt when I wasn’t around, the next time she saw me, she would show me the “owee”, and cry all over again. **My Soon To Be Ex:** During this time in my first marriage, things were really falling apart with my ex. But I hung in there for little D, who was by then 3 years old. Around that time, D’s Mom had finally found stable housing in another city. So I was driving 2 hours each way Saturday morning to bring D to our house, then driving 2 hours each way Sunday night to take her back to her mom. 8 hours on the road, every weekend. Now that D had a better place to live, I felt like the pressure was off me. And things were getting even worse with my ex. Another long story, but it was time for me to save myself and get out. **A Generous Offer (If I want to be generous):** After I’d been out of the house for a few months, my soon-to-be-ex wanted another $10,000, presumably to get herself a new lawyer. (What she’d done with the money I’d already given her was never explained, and I was never going to see any of that money again.) And this was NOT money she was owed or entitled to. In fact, she already owed me thousands, with no way to pay it back. Yet here she was, asking for even more. So, how was she going to pressure me into giving her all this extra money? Basically, she got Daddy J. to help her. The story she cooked up, was that if I didn’t give her an extra $10K, then J would view this as proof that I was a bad person. And J just wasn’t willing to let his young daughter be exposed to such an awful human. Unless, of course, I came up with $10,000 - then I was a good guy, safe for little D to be around. Many of her friends interpreted this as blackmail. As in, “If you want to see your loved-one again, you have to pay $10,000.” **The Great (Internal) Debate**: I am ashamed to say, that I gave this scheme some serious thought. I tried to figure out where I could get $10K, but things were already tight, with legal bills and supporting two households (she was still in the house and I was paying everything). Plus I was going to be stuck with a lot of debt from our marriage (another long story). I also realized that, if I gave in now, then in another few weeks, or maybe a month or two, there would be another excuse, with another price tag. And another. So, I made the hardest, most painful decision of my life. I just said to Daddy J, “Do what you think is right, but I won’t give your mother $10,000 that I don't have, that I don’t owe her, and that I will never get back.” I felt like I was in the biblical story, where two adults are fighting over the same child. I realized that the child was the one being harmed, so I chose to be the one who let go, and stopped the tug-of-war. Maybe I loved her the most?

No, I really was the stepfather, not the father. No, I did not adopt them. Spousal support was the maximum allowed by law by the state, but the state rarely approves spousal support. They were relying entirely on the threat of publishing my name as a deadbeat dad in the public eye regardless of truth. I would be shunned. I might even be fired as a public nightmare. The only thing she could not figure out is why that particular lawyer would try that. He was good, not stupid. It had to be a stunt she thought. So she wanted to make an equally absurd offer to force them to meet in the middle, each side giving away a little absurdity until all that remained was the 50/50 norm for the state. It made sense, but I couldn’t do it. I could never make an offer that wasn’t a serious one. We had to start at 50/50. I would never make an offer that was equally as absurd as my wife’s demands. My lawyer was not happy. I told her to ask her friend, my counselor, but it was not my way to make a demand that was unfair to someone else. I could accept the possibility of unfair to myself, but I could never accept an offer that was unfair to someone else. We started at fair and reasonable. My lawyer stared at me for a moment, then resigned…. Clients occasionally do stupid things, I was at least being honest with her. So she made the offer of 50/50, but an equally fast withdrawal if they didn’t go for it, and demand to go to court immediately if they didn’t agree. Of course my 2nd wife would never agree. I think my lawyer had already figured out the big secret as to why the other lawyer was resorting to threats and blackmail. So we applied for a court date. Closer to the court date, depositions were given at the courthouse. My wife, myself, and the two lawyers were present. And my lawyer called a surprise witness to a divorce proceeding…. The children’s father, my wife’s first husband. It completely caught the other lawyer off guard. My wife had been lying to him that the children were mine and that I was shorting them money. He really believed I was a deadbeat dad. Her demands from me for child support were twice what he was paying. She had him give his income and child support amounts in court testimony. It would be a nice gig, if it worked that way. Get child support from every ex, just keep collecting exes and you could make a fortune pretty quick. Then my lawyer called my wife for a questions in the deposition. Her lawyer had to go on the defensive for a situation he was not prepared for. I had been in mock trials for a while, so I knew a few things. My lawyer then caught me and the other lawyer off-guard by asking my wife “why.” You avoid open ended questions like that. You want to keep control. “Why did you ask for twice as much child support from your 2nd husband as the children’s father was already paying.” or something to that extent. Before my wife’s lawyer could interrupt, my wife had answered, on the record in her pre-court deposition, “because I still like my first husband.” After that my wife’s lawyer wouldn’t let her answer anything, and wanted to move back to negotiation. My lawyer put the original 50/50 offer we had offered back when they started with threats and blackmail. “Sign it, or we go to court. No negotiations.” As soon as the other lawyer realized it was the original offer and fair, he was telling my wife to sign it.

Although this question implies someone being blackmailed, because they have done something they prefer is not made public, my answer relates to a very common situation that could be called blackmail. In child custody cases, it’s normal the parent who has custody, usually the mother, gets child maintenance as part of a court order. The father gets an order allowing him “access time” to their children. If the mother wants more money than the court order demands, or if she wants other items, such as property he may own, then she may start finding ways to block his access to their children. Typically, she will do this by alienating the children against him. Additionally, she’ll make arrangements, for the children, that conflict with the access times due to the father. The father then has two choices. He accepts her demands and retains his access to their children. However, in his second choice, if the mother wants more from him, she’ ll have to go back to court to get a court order that justifies him having to give her more money. The father knows going back to court can take months and not achieve anything so he’ll “pay up” if he can afford it. If he can’t afford it, there is a good chance he will lose access to their children or have them alienated against him. If he complains to the court the mother is in contempt of court, by stopping his access to their children, she’ll respond by stating she’s not stopping his access. She’ll simply say the children do not wish to see him again. Even if the children do not wish to see him again, he’ll still have to pay maintenance. In essence, he has effectively been blackmailed. This situation arises thousands of times every week in Western countries. Many websites have been created because of this. parental alienation - Google Search EDIT: In the light of the comments, I think my reference is closer to extortion than blackmail. However, false allegations do play a significant part in such cases and, such allegations are, in effect, a form of blackmail. Although my comments appear to denigrate mothers, the vast majority of mothers put their children’s interests first. The bulk of studies, on family welfare, are researched and written by women. With same those women, they are concerned with the social effects of single-parent families.

Blackmailed? Currently, it seems we are being blackmailed weekly. There is a group offshore that calls and says they are from the Canada Revenue Agency, and that they have errors in our return. That the errors are serious and are considered fraud. If we remit $10,000 immediately the RCMP will not be called to arrest us. When we refused to respond the next week the call came the RCMP have been notified, but the warrant can be squashed if we remit $15,000. That call was repeated for the next week. Then it was “The RCMP have scheduled your arrest, but it is not too late to end this just remit what you owe”. I called the CRA and was told my file was clear, and was told they NEVER call a client. All correspondance was done in writing to the client or to their designated authority, such as their accountant. The next time they called I informed them “I am a CRA auditor, employee xxxx and have sent a copy of this call to the RCMP”. I have not heard from them since. However, I have since heard from friends that a few of their staff with sketchy immigration status have fallen for this scam for fear it would lead to deportation. I said at the beginning it was happening weekly. Well the CRA scheme is now old news. There is a new one, but they are using recorded messages to threaten legal action. Unfortunately, the accent is so bad, I cannot relate the details. Careful out there, there is always someone looking to take what you worked hard to earn.

My friend explained the situation to me and I was also a bit shocked. I went through many writings on quora and other online articles which taught me NOT TO PAY to the scammer. I even contacted the Police helpdesk and I was told to have my friend directly contact the police instead of I being a moderator. I advised the same to my friend, to block the person and deactivate his account. But, my friend was a bit tensed since the scammer has already have his friend list details and worried that he may publicize the video link to everyone. The video was immediately reported on Youtube. Finally, he bargained with the scammer and unfortunately he paid that amount! :( Once paid, he was asked to show him the receipt and still the scammer showed his unhappy face and asked him to round the figure. I personally feel so bad that he paid a sum to the scammer and I feel like that he succeeded in his game. I used to dox, so I was on both sides of some blackmail situations. dox däks/ verb informal search for and publish private or identifying information about (a particular individual) on the Internet, typically with malicious intent."hackers and online vigilantes routinely dox both public and private figures"I’m not a real hacker of course, so I couldn’t do much, but I could easily find out any information about any person I wanted (to some extent). I would send deliveries and escorts to people’s homes to annoy them and get what I wanted. I would take down their social media accounts with the information I have (memorializing a Facebook account with a faked death certificate, for example) if I wanted to. But this meant that a lot of people were after me too. I’ve been routinely threatened by teenagers on the internet, and I’ve routinely threatened others. For a long while, it’s been a huge part of my life. It was scary and unhealthy at many times. One story in particular, kind of stuck with me, and was part of the reason why I left this lifestyle behind. I was great at hiding my identity. I rarely had troubles in protecting myself, but this one person was quite obviously better than me. My webcam was hacked into. It was taped over, but he could obviously still hear me through my microphone. He would send me messages on Skype repeating things I would have said at home, listening to me through my microphone. There were a few threats, not many, but I was left alone for the most part. So of course the logical thing to do would be to just buy a new laptop. I’m fine now though, and I haven’t gotten back in contact with any of the people I was involved with when I was part of this online “hacking” vigilante ring.

When I was about 12 years old, I often went to the local pool hall. I loved pinball, and that’s where most of the machines were, in our small town. The problem was that my parents forbade me to go there, because of unsavory people who frequented the place. One of those people, a teenaged bully, started asking me for money, in return for not telling my parents. My memories of this are a bit dim: I think I gave him some money but didn’t have a lot to give him. I offered him my precious comic book collection, but he wasn’t interested. I still cringe when remember how I humiliated myself. Replaying an alternate version of the incident, in which I would tell the guy to go ahead and tell my parents, helped me gain a measure of backbone and decades later gave me the strength to disclose to the Defense Industrial Security Clearance Office my membership in High Tech Gays. (I wasn’t involved in the famous lawsuit—High Tech Gays v. Defense Industrial Security Clearance Office - Wikipedia—but am proud of the small extent to which my membership dues helped the cause.)
